name: INCOMING (itch) (CaioKotan)
description:
INCOMING.

Imagine that: you are a delivery man and you live in a world where this profession is full of obstacles and challenges. Being a profession little chosen by most citizens. Your job is simple, cross towns in order to deliver letters and gifts between people, which on the way can be challenging because of the different monsters and creatures along your journey.

Incoming has a little different gameplay having traces of undertale with setting and graphics based on titan souls.

//  IMPORTANT THING: THIS IS A EXECUTABLE VERSION OF THE INCOMING, THE WEB BROWSER VERSION ARE DISPONIBLE IN MY ACCOUNT.  //
